name: Falling Rock/Stop the Hero
description: This is a simple side project for a weekly game jam. It is called falling rocks. The game consist of one level. Your goal is to collect 65 gems while trying not to get hit by the falling rocks or touching them. The rocks are big and very hot from the desert so they will damage the player if they are touched. After you collect 65 gems you will win the game yayyy!! Hope you guys enjoy.
